content: materials to make four washcloths… - 1 skein of purl soho s field linen 1 100% linen each skein is 295 yards/ 100 grams approximately 295 total yards required or 73 yards required for each washcloth - us 4 3 5 mm circular or straight needles 3 - if using straight needles two us 4 double pointed needles 4 for i-cord gauge 26 stitches and 52 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern blocked note we used the entire skein to make all four washcloths so to get four please make sure your gauge is correct size unblocked dimensions approximately 5½ inches wide x 9 inches long finished dimensions approximately 6½ inches wide x 8¾ inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/field-linen 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=969 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888
